fullplot: John Holmes was a legend of the porn industry and revered in circles as a stud. But in 1981, years after his successful career and star fading, Holmes was a desperate man with his own internal demons to live up to. He's estranged from his wife, holding onto a relationship with his teenage mistress, and living as a junkie in search of his next fix. But one fateful night left four people dead and John as a key suspect in one of the most grisly murders in Los Angeles. Was he partly responsible for what happened at Wonderland Avenue?
plot: In the police investigation of a brutal crime scene, one man was at the center of it all: legendary porn star John Holmes.
title: Wonderland

tomatoes.consensus: A sordid and pointless movie with some good preformances.
